media:group.media:title: Can Smash Ultimate Survive This?
media:group.media:description:
Should Steve and Kazuya really be banned?

Now that in-person events are making a comeback, DLC characters that were previously only limited to online play are being put to the test on LAN.

Two characters, in particular, Steve from Minecraft and Tekken's Kazuya have been the subject of a controversial debate as many players have advocated for their ban from tournaments while others believe that the two characters aren't problematic enough to warrant such a ruling.

We traveled to GOML and spoke with the Smash Bros community in search of an answer to this controversial topic. Here is what we found.
